entry.title: Sunday: Chance of flurries. Temperature steady near zero. POP 60%
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy with 60 percent chance of flurries. Wind southwest 30 km/h gusting to 50. Temperature steady near zero. Wind chill minus 8 this afternoon. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 11:00 AM AST Sunday 25 December 2022
